Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00><clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small fishing town on the
edge of the sea <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here, is a
famous resort spot.
And it's home to <clr:0000>Hyrule's finest sunrise<clr:ffff>!
The moment the sun clears the horizon
and lights the village is truly a must-see.
They say it's best experienced from the
<clr:0000>summit of Tuft Mountain<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>But I can't leave my job to go sightseeing
any more than I can, well, climb a
mountain. And it's so far away...
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>You've given us an incredible gift, Link.
I can practically feel the light of the
sunrise warming up our stable!
Right now, the whole world is in chaos
because of <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>...

But no matter how dark the night, it's
always followed by the dawn. <sp:5:0:0>That's the
feeling that will carry me through this.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Do you have <clr:0000>a picture of Hyrule's
finest sunrise<clr:ffff>?
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're really that fixated on our garland,
you should head to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> and
buy your own.
Just head north. You can't miss it.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I wish I had some sort of picture of
<clr:0000>Hyrule's finest sunrise<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Then I could
paint it for myself!
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a <clr:0000>picture of Hyrule's finest
sunrise<clr:ffff>, please show it to me!
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Doesn't it look spectacular?<sp:5:0:0> It wasn't the
easiest painting I've ever done, but what
a view!
If you can top that with another <clr:0000>picture of<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Hyrule's finest sunrise<clr:ffff>, I'm happy to copy
and frame a new one.
So if you're ever struck by the urge to
replace the picture, don't be shy about
showing me something new!
WakkaCharm: Oh, we have one of those.
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>There it is! Hyrule's best sunrise over
Lurelin!<sp:5:0:0> What majesty!<sp:5:0:0> What breathtaking
natural splendor!
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Thank you, Link. Thank you for bringing
me such an amazing sight!
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It makes me smile just thinking of seeing
<clr:0000>that beautiful sunrise over Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>
from the summit of Tuft Mountain.
I would love to paint that view for myself,
but I'm afraid my job comes first...
9007: I like it how it is.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The drawings at this stable have gotten
out of hand, haven't they?

I'm sorry about that. No matter how many
times I scold them, those sons of mine
just don't listen.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If you ask them, they'll tell you they saw
some <clr:0000>big footprints<clr:ffff>, the likes of which
nobody has ever seen!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I swear, I'll never stop being surprised by
the things my kids can imagine.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>That ring garland catch your fancy?<sp:5:1:0>
It's pretty cute, right?

A young girl in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>to the
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> made it.

I put it up hoping it might bring some calm
to the travelers that visit this place.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I've already had customers tell me that
the sight of this painting lifts their spirits!
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't give you ours, but if you really
want a ring garland of your own...

Then I recommend you buy one at
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, directly north of here.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, you just reminded me. Apparently a
new species of animal called a "Dondon"
has been discovered in Faron.
This old world of ours is just full of
surprises, isn't it?
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> did you have thoughts about
that <clr:0000>picture of Hyrule's finest sunrise<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now for the fun part. Because this is your
first time here at Dueling Peaks Stable...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In addition to celebrating your first use of
Dueling Peaks Stable, we want to thank
you for <clr:0000>registering a horse<clr:ffff>. So...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Quite the frame, isn't it?<sp:5:0:0> I want to fill it
with an appropriately grand scene of
natural splendor, but, well...
Tell me, Link, do you know where to find
<clr:0000>Hyrule's most beautiful sunrise<clr:ffff>?

At the edge of the sea <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here
is a small fishing village called <clr:0000>Lurelin<clr:ffff>.
It has a reputation as a resort town.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But its real claim to fame is the beautiful
moment where the sun rises over the
horizon and lights up the whole village!
And they say the most breathtaking view
of this sunrise is from the <clr:0000>summit of
Tuft Mountain<clr:ffff>...
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>I'd love to see that view myself, but it's
so far away, and I can't just leave work...<sp:5:0:0>
Nor can I climb mountains.
If only I could see <clr:0000>Hyrule's finest sunrise<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
I'd paint my own picture of it and finally
put that frame to use.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Not only is this your first use of Dueling
Peaks Stable but you've even <clr:0000>lodged
with us<clr:ffff>. That deserves a reward, so...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hmm?<sp:5:0:0> Do you have <clr:0000>a picture of Hyrule's
finest sunrise<clr:ffff>?
